name: Beached: Escape From Bunny Island
description:
Beached: Escape From Bunny Island provides a lighthearted atmosphere and a simplistic, imaginative environment for the player to explore and enjoy. With the use of a simplified platforming control scheme, players are able to explore, complete objectives, and defeat various opponents. Beached creates an environment that offers its players the opportunity to easily play-through and discover it's unique set of challenges.

**MUST USE GAMEPAD. Tutorials use Xbox buttons layout**

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLX8bWOQARkw...

Info:

Beached: Escape From Bunny Island is a senior project from the University of Central Florida Game Design Program. It was made during one semester (January 12, 2015 - May 4, 2015) by 13 students.

Credits:

Position Name Producer Sean Pinnock Creative Director James Alleman Lead Designer Kevin O'Mara Tech Lead Peter Napolitano Lead Artist Todd Stolz-Schroeder Animator Travis Fort Artist James Mohring Artist Ashley Herrold Artist James Singer Artist Luis Rodriguez Designer Travis Polselli Designer Keston Gregory Programmer Adam Clark
